choices.name: Flip it and put it in the water
Ask him to show you the way
Hit your head with the brick

scenes.name: start
scenes.dialog: You awake on an unknown island, you have no recollection of the past, not even knowledge of your own name.  The island is small but there is a wood pile, a cluster of large boulders, and a small cave in the sand. What do you do?

scenes.name: sail off
scenes.dialog: You get in the boat and row away

scenes.name: inevit
scenes.dialog: You give in to your dark thoughts and repeatedly hit the top of your head with the brick.  You are dead.

scenes.name: beast
scenes.dialog:
You begin to sprint into the darkness, blindly running until you run into something immovable and your vision flashes white.
You land on your butt and your forehead is filled with immense pain.  You sit up and hear predator-like growling behind you.  Then a piercing pain in the back of your head and all goes black.  You are dead.

scenes.name: beast2
scenes.dialog:
You stupidly call out if anyone is there, when suddenly, from the pitch black you see gigantic fangs come into the dim light,
 and as quickly as you saw them, they are wrapped around your head and all goes black.  You are dead.

scenes.name: ask
scenes.dialog:
You ask who he is.  His eyes widen, and his coarse voice shouts in your direction: 
'YOU MUST JUMP IN THE CAVE AND DISCOVER YOUR DESTINY.  RECLAIM BRICK CITY, IT CALLS FOR YOU
choices: Ask him to show you the way

scenes.name: left
scenes.dialog:
You go left.  After about 2 minutes of walking, you reach the end of the cave, and are met with the bright sunny sky.  
You step out and see that you are on a different island now, the tunnel must connect islands

scenes.name: right
scenes.dialog:
You go right.  You hear a screech in the darkness that bounces around the cave walls.  
You shiver and keep moving until the ground levels out.  You notice the trail comes to a large puddle.  You realize it's blood. Then you see a human skull a few feet away.  You hear deep, hindered breathing behind you.
choices: Hit your head with the brick

scenes.name: punch
scenes.dialog:
You lunge forward, madly swinging your fist at his head.  He swiftly dodges and jumps on you.  
He begins to bite your hand, and then your shoulder, then neck.  Pain fills your body and your screams echo across the island.  You are dead.

scenes.name: boat discovery
scenes.dialog: It turns out the woodpile is actually an overturned rowboat, what do you do?
choices: Flip it and put it in the water

scenes.name: cave
scenes.dialog: You approach the cave in the sand, it is extremely steep and dark, but you see a tiny light at the bottom

scenes.name: show
scenes.dialog: He cackles and rubs his hands together, then leads you over to the deep, sandy hole in the ground.

scenes.name: boulder
scenes.dialog: You walk around the large boulders and see something huddled against the a big, gray rock. Inspect?

scenes.name: hobo
scenes.dialog:
You inspect the animal, it appears to be a thin, dirty man, with a beard as long as his torso.  
He spots you and leaps to his feet, thankfully his beard covers everything that'd be undesirable to see

scenes.name: fall
scenes.dialog: You flail wildly as you fall down the dark abyss, suddenly you see a pool of water below, illuminated by the light from the top of the cave

scenes.name: splash
scenes.dialog: You splash deep into the water, beneath the surface all is dark, but you see a mysterious glow below you

scenes.name: brick
scenes.dialog: You swim down and see a glowing brick, so bright it almost hurts to see, lying in the cool, dark sand

scenes.name: undercave
scenes.dialog:
You grasp it, the texture if rough and it is heavy.  The glowing dims slightly and you swim straight up.  
Gasping for air, you reach the surface and in the brick's gentle light, you see a cave entrance on the far wall
choices: Hit your head with the brick

scenes.name: black
scenes.dialog:
You pull yourself up the ledge and into the darkness, after walking a few steps you hear a loud, 
echoing screech that sends a shiver down your spine

scenes.name: walkalong
scenes.dialog: You walk along the cave wall, letting thr brick's light guide you forward.  You come to a fork intersection in the cave.  The left side has an upward slope and what looks like light at the end; the right side has a downward slope into darkness, a dark liquid draws a path on the floor

scenes.name: toodark
scenes.dialog:
You swim directly to the surface, taking a big gulp of air at the top.  
Upon peering around you see a dark blob on the wall and realize it must be a way out; it's a cave

scenes.name: surprise
scenes.dialog: You take a step back when suddenly, you're shoved from behind, and you're sent down the hole

scenes.name: death
scenes.dialog: You land head first and like landing face first into concrete, you die.

scenes.name: beware
scenes.dialog:
You resist the urge to hit yourself with the brick and pull yourself up the ledge and into the cave, 
the brick gently illuminates the cave walls, showing a damp interior
